= Introduction =

Green mongo query is Java based mongo Client. 
Its support both *linux* and *windows*.



= Details =

  * Its support multiple connections
  * Tabular display or data and json display .
  * Support update delete or insert data .
  * Support database deletion, creation and update.
  * Support new collection deletion, creation and update.
  * Support Mongo query in tabular format and json format.
